articles.title: NFL owners approve ban on swivel hip-drop tackling technique - ESPN
articles.description: NFL owners have approved a rule proposal to ban the swivel hip-drop tackle, the league announced Monday.
articles.content:
Mar 25, 2024, 11:13 AM ET
NFL owners have approved a rule proposal to ban the swivel hip-drop tackle, the league announced Monday.
The violation will result in a 15-yard penalty if flagged in games… [+6602 chars]

articles.title: Bengaluru water board to use AI, IoT for borewell management - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Bangalore Water Supply and Sewerage Board (BWSSB) pilots technology in five public borewells, and plans to expand its implementation to a total of 7,000 borewells.
articles.content:
Bangalore Water Supply and Sewerage Board (BWSSB) has decided to use Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Internet of Things (IoT) technologies for efficient borewell management.
